0.9.author: sborho
0.9.message: i18n: pull final Ukranian translation for 0.9

1.0.2.author: sborho
1.0.2.message:
status: catch util.Abort from repo.parents()

is_merge() is the place this is usually caught first in the commit tool.
Place a warning in the status bar telling the user to refresh.

Closes #1200

0.1.author: sborho
0.1.message:
hggtk/hgcmd: cleaner method for closing dialog

also fixes a long-standing copy-paste bug

0.3.author: sborho
0.3.message: release: credit Peer Sommerlund with new installer bitmap

0.2.author: TK Soh
0.2.message: hggtk/history: only refresh log window if new rev is checked out

0.7.author: sborho
0.7.message:
synch: strip white space around path

fixes #46

0.9.1.1.author: sborho
0.9.1.1.message: doc: schemes extension now ships with hg

2.3.author: yuja
2.3.message: revdetails: fall back to tip on reload if current rev is unknown (fixes #1581)

2.0.3.author: sborho
2.0.3.message: purge: give confirmation dialog a proper parent

2.1.2.author: 4ndreaSt4gi
2.1.2.message: repoview: fixes ctrl click behavior reported in #1019

2.1.3.author: sborho
2.1.3.message:
wix: no longer ship win32_crypto.pyd

the keyring library now uses ctypes to interface with the Windows crypto API

1.1.author: sborho
1.1.message: doc: fixup links to hgbook to use our 1.6 build

2.1.1.author: sborho
2.1.1.message: wctxactions: give parent to transient menus (closes #716)

0.0.1.author: TK Soh
0.0.1.message: cmenu: use different menu for hgk/hgview

0.0.2.author: TK Soh
0.0.2.message: hggtk/merge: clear rev input after merging

0.7.6.author: sborho
0.7.6.message:
history: handle cmenu requests on empty treeview areas

Fixes #227

0.7.4.author: sborho
0.7.4.message:
thgconfig: do not set active row of empty combo

prevents a GTK warning on Windows

0.7.5.author: sborho
0.7.5.message:
datamine: truncate treeview text data at 128 chars

Fixes #128

0.7.2.author: sborho
0.7.2.message:
shell: tortoisehg.dll should not be using os.popen()

This call was added by me in January before I understood how tortoisehg.py
was used as a both COM server and as a registration script.  It's all kinds of
bad that it is trying to run python every time this script is executed.

fixes #113

2.0.2.author: sborho
2.0.2.message:
Backed out changeset: 5aba622d4a65

Favor memory leaks over crashes until we can arrive at a safe solution to the
shared/demand widgets.  Refs #309

0.7.1.author: sborho
0.7.1.message:
hgshelve: get file list from qdiffs when necessary

fixes #107

0.4rc2.author: sborho
0.4rc2.message: changeset: copy hash to clipboard is now optional, default: False

1.9.2.author: sborho
1.9.2.message: filedialogs: add a revpanel widget above the HgFileView

0.3rc1.author: sborho
0.3rc1.message:
ReleaseNotes: remove note about TortoisePlink

As it turns out, the version shipped with TortoiseSvn hasn't changed in many
years.  The Wiki will just need to point to the original Plink for users that
have trouble with TortoisePlink.

2.2.2.author: yuja
2.2.2.message:
wconfig: translate ParsingError of iniparse to error.ParseError (refs #1512)

Because wconfig is a kind of Mercurial's config object, it should hide
iniparse behavior.

With this change, ParsingError can be caught at global exception handler.

0.9.1.author: sborho
0.9.1.message:
iss: html man pages need style.css to be shipped

Without the css file, the documents are very underwhelming

1.1.1.author: sborho
1.1.1.message: wix: pull help.wxs updates from Mercurial

1.1.9.1.author: wbruna
1.1.9.1.message: thread: fix display of SSL error messages

1.1.6.1.author: sborho
1.1.6.1.message:
changeset: provide filtered changes to patch.diff

The repo.status() call in patch.diff() was how the provided matcher was used
to build the list of files to be diffed.  So now we directly filter the cached
repo.status() results and pass those to patch.diff()

0.8.2.author: sborho
0.8.2.message:
iss: put back global mutex lock for 0.8.2 release

Force the user to shutdown the taskbar app manually, since the automated
method seems to cause the taskbar app to crash messily in some circumstances.
Trade-off a little annoyance for less user confusion.

0.8.3.author: sborho
0.8.3.message:
hgtk: correct arguments to dispatch() when launching qct

Fixes #615

0.7.3.author: sborho
0.7.3.message:
shlib: only send one shell notification per directory

This should improve the performance and possibly robustness
of large repository operations.  It should not adversely effect
the shell overlays since it will get fewer refresh events and the
overlay code is already optimized to re-read entire directories.

1.9.3.author: abuehl
1.9.3.message:
hgemail: do not close main dialog when emails sent

I often do a test send to myself before sending a patch
to the "real" recipient, so I would like to decide myself
when the main email dialog window should be closed.

This is especially important when I've written an intro.
If the dialog is closed on send implicitly, I do have to
enter the intro text again for the real send.

tip.author: wbruna
tip.message: i18n: pull latest da, de and pt_BR translations from Launchpad
